name: Summer Intern
description: Performed exploratory analysis on GBM TCGA RNA sequenced samples in an attempt to find splicing patterns that could be recognized as signatures. Used MESA in order to quantify the splicing in the data. Created PCA's for dimensionality reduction and used python pandas and Jupyter notebooks to manage the data

name: Software Engineer Trainee
description: I worked in the creation of a web application for a Puerto Rico municipality. The goal is to digitalize the project auction process so that companies can bid more easily through one platform. This system will help the transparency and efficiency of the current system. We are using PHP with Laravel 9, MYSQL, HTML5, Bootstrap 5 and JavaScript to build this app.  I am currently working with both backend and frontend. We use Docker to manage our server environments and follow the MVC design pattern.

name: Software Engineer
description: I am a contractor for Elavon. A payment processing company subsidiary of US Bank. Currently handling the company's payment plugins for stores such as woocommerce, Magento 2 and Prestashop. Also, handling automation for testing the plugins.
